name: stirringly
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a way that produces strong, positive emotions: He spoke stirringly, and got everyone fired up. The chorus sang stirringly in the opening performance. See
stirring
More examplesFewer examplesHis portrait of the Virgin Mary is stirringly beautiful.Henry was adored at Arsenal Football Club because he was stirringly committed to his team-mates.One of the highlights of the book is the stirringly told story of the cavalry charge up the Somosierra pass in 1808.
